title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.20 - Labeling of poisonous or toxic materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.20 - Labeling of poisonous or toxic materials

State Regulations

Containers of poisonous or toxic materials necessary for
operational maintenance of the establishment shall be prominently and
distinctly labeled. Small working containers of bulk cleaning agents shall be
individually labeled for easy identification of contents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
